column4: hey all, i have a question. I have a TEW-303 wireless lan-card from which i get internet. but i want to have internet on ubuntu. does ubuntu support that card?
hey all, i have a question. I have a TEW-303 wireless lan-card from which i get internet. but i want to have internet on ubuntu. does ubuntu support that card?
You'd be best off Googling the card.  These days, the usual answer is, "Yes, the card is supported one way or another."
